titleStmt.title: SII 14.261: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 261. (A.R. No. 49 of 1929.) ŚIVAPURI, TIRUPPATTUR TALUK, RAMANATHAPURAM DISTRICT. ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE SVAYAMPRAKĀŚA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This inscription is dated in the year opposite to the 26th year of the reign of Śrīvallabha. It is incomplete and appears to register gift of money by a brāhmaṇa lady of Śivapuri which was invested on the purchase of some land named Śikhaṇḍivaśakkal, for providing worship to god Tiruttāndōṉṟīśvaram-Uḍaiyār at Nṛipaśēkhara-chaturvēdimaṅgalam.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tiribhuvanaccakkaravarttikaḷ śrīvallavatevaṟku yāṇṭu 2 10 6- Āvati ṉetirā māṇṭu keraḷaciṅkavaḷa
nāṭṭu brahmateyam nirupacekaraccaruppetimaṅkalattu tiruttāntoṉṟiśvaramuṭaiyār kaṉmikaḷom I
vvūr nārāyaṇaṉ śrīvāsutevaṉuḷḷiṭṭār pakkal Ivvūr muṭikoṇṭacoḻap pererikkiḻc cittaviḷākat
tu maturāntakavatikku meṟkut teṉṉellai tirumāliruñcolai nārāyaṇan cāttapirāṉ paṭṭaṉ pakka littevar vilai
koṇṭanilattukku vaṭakkum me(l)lellai jātavedaṉ cāttapirāṉpaṭṭa ṉuḷḷiṭṭār nilat tukku kiḻakkum vaṭa
vellai paḻaṅkaraikku tekkum Āka Icainta perunāṉkellaik kuṭpaṭṭa cikaṇṭivacak kal paḻavarampu kuṟiyāka vanta
nilam muṟṟu Ittevar vilaikoṇṭamaiyil Innilam meṟkaṭaiya Aḷavukol Aruṇitiyāl nilam kāṇi Araikkara
ṇikkum civapuri Irukkum brāhmaṇi Uṭaiyāṇṭāḷ Innilattukku veṇṭuvatu śrīpaṇ ṭāratte Oṭukki InThe inscription stops here.
Digital edition of SII 14.261 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
